Title: Shape Gym
Description: New, cozy, modern sport club in Kaunas city.

Title: Aušros SPA
Description: Aušros SPA mission is to bring equilibrium to your mind, body and spirit. You can choose from a full range of exceptional treatments followed by pure tranquility, where muscle tension and the mind’s concerns simply melt away allowing you to emerge refreshed, balanced and energized.

Title: FITNIE ACADEMY
Description: Fitnie Academy by Galinta is a sport club in Kaunas with unique location and professional trainers. Their goal is to provide the best quality services, emotions and long-term relationship with the customers and contribute to healthier life by sharing the knowledge with everyone in the sport club.

Title: Old Town Barbers
Description: Senamiestyje įkurtame barberyje apsilankę klientai ras visas būtiniausias grožio procedūras: nuo barzdų formavimo iki plaukų kirpimo ir vyriško manikiūro.

Title: SIL sports center
Description: Even the most sophisticated customers can enjoy high-quality workouts in SIL sports center. Qualified sports and health professionals are always ready to help to reach your goals.

Title: High Care -  beauty and health center
SportGates
Description: SportGates is a new, vibrant, unstoppable 24/7 sport club in Kaunas. At the very heart of Kaunas Old Town you can find 100 high-quality fitness machines, professional trainers, administration and parking lots.

Title: GymPlius
Address: Baltų pr. 49, Kaunas; V. Krėvės pr. 13, Kaunas

Title: VS Fitness
Description: VS FITNESS - is the largest sports and wellness center in the Baltic countries, where you can always feel comfortable, efficiently save your time, and boldly discover your new opportunities.

Title: SHANTI (Ayurvedic massage)
Description: Since time immemorial people have been trying to find ways how to prolong their youth and lives. Thus what can be better than ancient natural treatments that have been checked by time and experience. Ayurveda that is one of the oldest and the most effective medicine systems is widely applied in India and the rest of the world. We believe that you have to not only cure the illnesses but also to nourish your body and soul in order to live a long and healthy life.

Title: ŽALGIRIS Sport Complex
Address: A. ir J. Gravrogkų g. 4, Kaunas
Description: At Žalgiris Sport Complex, visitors of all ages can choose activities for improving the health of the body. Exercises will give you a sense of good mood.

Title: BIOFIRST –  ADVANCED MEDICINE AND BEAUTY CLINIC
